title: Two Months of Meaningful Growth at Deutsche Telekom Digital Labs
summary: Reflecting on my first corporate internship at Deutsche Telekom Digital Labs, where I worked with the Data Team on backend engineering and microservices. Gained hands-on experience with Java (8, 17, 21), Apache Kafka, Docker, API validation using Postman, and understanding how large-scale engineering systems operate in production.

title: DSA Under Load: Rate Limiting During End Sem Exams
summary: A system-design-inspired reflection on balancing end semester exams with my 100 Days of DSA challenge. Framed exams as a high-CPU blocking service, internships as live production traffic, and DSA practice as rate-limited requests to keep the system healthy instead of crashing.
